channel.title: Comparison on On the art of digiscoping
channel.description: Recent content in Comparison on On the art of digiscoping

item.title: Digiscoping vs DSLR camera
item.description: Capturing information Being a modern birder, it’s quite important to take good photos. Proof of identification is without exception the difference between ecstacy and life-long bitterness over the one that got away. I quite recently got a new phone and I’m curious about its capabilities of taking good photos, both in terms of being able to absorb useful information on a pixel level, but also in terms of taking aesthetic photos of birds and their surroundings.
